articles.title: Gasoline's record run pauses - Fox Business
articles.description: The average price for a gallon of gasoline in the U.S. put the brakes on a record streak over the weekend.
articles.content:
The average price for a gallon of gasoline
 in the U.S. put the brakes on a record streak over the weekend.
The price slipped by about a half-cent to $4.325 Sunday.
